name: SIUT
mission: Established in 2000, SIUT North America is a charitable organization under Section 501(c)(3). It is dedicated to health-related humanitarian causes, with its major focus on helping Sindh Institute of Urology and Transplantation (SIUT) Pakistan secure vital medical funds so all patients are treated free of charge and without discrimination.
theoryOfChange: SIUT North America raises and provides funding/grants to SIUT Pakistan so patients receive lifesaving, world-class medical treatment completely free of cost and with dignity, ensuring no patient is turned away due to financial hardship.
zakatClaimEvidence: SIUT North America, Inc. has a 'Select a campaign' option on Kindful that includes 'Zakat'. Additionally, Feeling Blessed states, 'Your Zakat and Sadaqah has the power to save lives. Donate to SIUTNA and help us provide free healthcare with dignity.' (Source: https://siutna.org/ways-to-donate/)

ui_signals_v1.recommendation_rationale: Strong donor fit, low risk profile, and credible supporting evidence for outcomes.

components.evidence: Accepts zakat (+2); Muslim-focused organization (+2); Asnaf: fuqara (+5); Operates in Muslim-majority regions (+3); Strong humanitarian service (+4)
components.name: Muslim Donor Fit

alignment.rationale: Alignment 44/50: HIGH Muslim donor fit, humanitarian cause area

components.evidence: Beneficiary count appears implausible; CPB excluded pending review
components.improvement_suggestion: Publish beneficiary counts consistently so cost-effectiveness can be assessed.
components.name: Cost Per Beneficiary

score_details.score_summary: SIUT North America Inc shows exceptional alignment and strong impact, with zakat compliance.

Additionally, Feeling Blessed states, 'Your Zakat and Sadaqah has the power to save lives. Donate to SIUTNA and help us provide free healthcare with dignity.' all_citations.claim: The organization holds a Charity Navigator score of 92.0/100 and maintains an 84.0% program expense ratio.
The organization provides grants for medicine and medical equipment.
SIUT North America Inc pays grants for medical equipment and medicine to support kidney treatments.
The charity provides grants and assistance to foreign organizations for medical purposes.
Financial filings confirm the distribution of grants for medicine and equipment.
The organization offers various donation options and is Zakat-eligible.
The organization reported a total revenue of $5,921,512.

baseline_narrative.amal_score_rationale: The organization earns a solid overall rating due to its high financial transparency and direct impact on humanitarian medical needs. Its Zakat eligibility and efficient fundraising make it a highly aligned choice for donors focusing on healthcare access.
areas_for_improvement: Limited working capital of 4.0 months, which may impact long-term financial sustainability
Heavy reliance on foreign assistance grants for program execution

dimension_explanations.alignment: The organization shows high alignment for humanitarian-focused donors, particularly within the Muslim community, as it is Zakat-eligible and addresses the urgent need for free specialized healthcare [6]. Its long-standing track record of providing grants to foreign medical organizations underscores its commitment to its mission [4].
dimension_explanations.impact: The charity demonstrates high direct impact by funding essential medical equipment and medicine for kidney-related diseases [3][5]. With a program expense ratio of 84.0%, it efficiently converts donations into medical services, though the cost per beneficiary is not explicitly detailed in public filings [1][2].

baseline_narrative.headline: SIUT North America Inc provides critical financial support for life-saving kidney transplants and dialysis treatments through the SIUT Charitable Trust.
strengths: High program expense ratio of 84.0%, ensuring the majority of funds go toward medical grants
Strong fundraising efficiency, spending only $0.17 to raise every $1
Verified Zakat-eligible status for Muslim donors
baseline_narrative.summary: SIUT North America Inc is a non-profit organization dedicated to supporting the SIUT Charitable Trust's mission of providing free medical care, specifically focusing on kidney transplants, dialysis, and diagnostic measures [2][3]. The organization reported a total revenue of $5,921,512 and maintains a high level of financial accountability with a Charity Navigator score of 92.0/100 [1][7].

alignment.explanation: Strong fit for Muslim donors as it is <cite id="6">verified as Zakat-eligible</cite> and serves urgent humanitarian medical needs in Pakistan.

credibility.explanation: Donors can trust this charity due to its <cite id="1">92/100 overall score from Charity Navigator</cite> and its Platinum Seal of Transparency from Candid.
credibility.improvement: To strengthen credibility further, the charity could publish detailed annual impact reports with audited beneficiary statistics.

impact.explanation: Operations show a <cite id="7">84.0% program expense ratio</cite> and highly efficient fundraising, spending just <cite id="1">$0.17 per $1 raised</cite>.
impact.improvement: Publish beneficiary counts consistently so cost-effectiveness can be assessed.

donor_fit_matrix.evidence_rigor: Grade C - Strong financial data but missing beneficiary counts

grantmaking_profile.grant_strategy: Primarily funds the SIUT Charitable Trust in Pakistan for medical equipment and medicine.

rich_narrative.headline: SIUT North America Inc provides critical financial support for life-saving kidney transplants and dialysis treatments through the SIUT Charitable Trust.

ideal_donor_profile.best_for_summary: Best for donors who want to fund direct, life-saving medical treatments (specifically kidney care and dialysis) for underserved populations in Pakistan using zakat-eligible funds.
donor_motivations: Want to fulfill zakat obligations by funding direct medical care
Care deeply about healthcare access in Pakistan
Value organizations with extremely high program expense ratios
giving_considerations: Funds are primarily deployed as grants to the SIUT Charitable Trust in Karachi
Specific cost-per-patient metrics are not currently published
ideal_donor_profile.not_ideal_for: Donors seeking to fund domestic US healthcare initiatives or those requiring rigorous academic evidence of long-term public health outcomes.

impact_evidence.evidence_grade_explanation: Grade C means the organization tracks basic financial outcomes and grant distributions, but lacks rigorous third-party evaluation or detailed beneficiary cost metrics.
impact_evidence.theory_of_change_summary: Providing financial grants to SIUT Charitable Trust enables free medical care, dialysis, and transplants for patients in Pakistan who cannot afford treatment.
impact_evidence.why_evidence_matters: Evidence helps ensure donations create real impact and reach the intended patients efficiently.

long_term_outlook.room_for_funding_explanation: The ongoing need for dialysis and kidney transplants in Pakistan far exceeds current funding capacity.
strategic_priorities: Expand medical grants for equipment and medicine

peer_comparison.differentiator: Distinguished by its <cite id="7">84.0% program expense ratio</cite> and specific focus on kidney and dialysis care in Pakistan.
similar_orgs: Islamic Medical Association of North America (IMANA)

similar_organizations.name: Islamic Medical Association of North America (IMANA)

strengths.detail: The organization directs a <cite id="7">84.0% program expense ratio</cite> toward its medical grants and services.
SIUT North America has demonstrated consistent expansion with an <cite id="7">18.9% 3-year revenue CAGR</cite>.
The charity has earned a <cite id="1">92/100 overall score from Charity Navigator</cite> and features a <cite id="1">84.0% independent board</cite>.

strengths_deep_dive: SIUT North America Inc excels in directing funds to its core mission. By maintaining a <cite id="7">84.0% program expense ratio</cite> and spending only <cite id="1">$0.17 per $1 raised</cite> on fundraising, the organization ensures that donor contributions maximize their impact on patient care. The charity's financial health is further evidenced by its <cite id="7">$5,921,512 in total revenue</cite> and a robust <cite id="7">18.9% 3-year revenue CAGR</cite>, indicating strong and growing donor support for its life-saving medical programs in Pakistan.
rich_narrative.summary: SIUT North America Inc is a dedicated non-profit organization that provides critical financial support for life-saving medical treatments in Pakistan. The organization focuses on funding kidney transplants, dialysis, and other diagnostic measures through the SIUT Charitable Trust. In its most recent filings, the charity reported <cite id="7">$5,921,512 in total revenue</cite> and demonstrated exceptional financial efficiency with a <cite id="7">84.0% program expense ratio</cite>. The organization has experienced strong growth, showing an <cite id="7">18.9% 3-year revenue CAGR</cite>. Donors can give with confidence knowing the charity holds a <cite id="1">92/100 overall score from Charity Navigator</cite> and maintains a Platinum Seal of Transparency from Candid. Furthermore, the organization is <cite id="6">verified as Zakat-eligible</cite>, making it an excellent choice for Muslim donors seeking to fulfill their religious obligations while supporting urgent humanitarian medical needs.
